CustomField.description: ** Required ** Select "Line Contact" to assign the Badge to the purchasing Customer as defined in the "Contact" lookup field on the Sales Order Line. Select "Assigned Contacts" to give the Badge to all "Active" assigned Contacts.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** Required ** Select "Line Contact" to assign the Badge to the purchasing Customer as defined in the "Contact" lookup field on the Sales Order Line. Select "Assigned Contacts" to give the Badge to all "Active" assigned Contacts.
CustomField.label: Type
